pageContext.claim: “The media and the Big Tech are desperately trying to cover up this massive scandal. I'm not just running against Sleepy Joe Biden. I'm running against the corrupt media, they're corrupt. The corrupt media, the Big Tech Giants. And I'm running against the Washington swamp.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump falsely claims that fact checks placed by social-media companies, pointing out his falsehoods, is a form of rigging the election. Twitter also made it difficult to circulate the New York Post article on Hunter Biden's laptop because it was unverified.
